website_summaries.verdict: With the features consumers need for adequate magnification and a reasonable price tag, this user-friendly magnifier is impressive.
pros: Has user-friendly features, including video output, up to 14-times magnification, rechargeable battery, and a vivid display, at an affordable price
Handle is convenient and folds down neatly when not in use
cons: Only has three color viewing modes
Some owners found the side power button awkward to use

customer_reviews.title: We took the battery to a Battery store and they'd never seen a battery like it. They didn't know where to even get ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my Dad with macular degeneration about a year and a half ago. He used it and thought it was very helpful. Then it stopped working. It appeared to be a battery issue. We took the battery to a Battery store and they'd never seen a battery like it. They didn't know where to even get one. We paid ~$200 for a unit that got limited use. There appears to be only a one year manufacturers warranty and no information about who to contact for assistance or to find out where to get another battery. I will be looking for another brand, with a replaceable battery, to replace the unit for my Dad.
customer_reviews.author: Rainy

customer_reviews.title: Crushes the Pebble
customer_reviews.text: My low-vision specialist introduced me to digital magnifiers via the Pebble, which at $650 was out of my price range. This ViSee device does everything the Pebble does, with a longer battery life per charge and at a third of the price. I'm thrilled with the product, and recommend it to anyone with low vision.

product_meta.title: Oasis Scientific ViSee 4.3" LCD Portable Electronic Digital Magnifier Reading Aid for Low Vision
product_meta.description: This 4.3” electronic video magnifier is a handy aid to those with low vision and macular degeneration. Small and compact, it can come to your aid anytime, anywhere. It magnifies from 6X to 14X on its LCD screen, offers 3 display color modes to suit your individual vision needs. It allows you to freeze text, record videos, and capture/save/recall images for easier viewing. This video magnifier is a great aid to reading, viewing maps, menus, recipes, and medication labels. It is also great for reading labels and tags at retail stores or anywhere you need bright, convenient magnification. Product Details: Dimensions: 5.1 x 1.3 x 3.4 inches. Weight: 8oz. Package Includes: Magnifier(1x), User's Guide(1x), Cleaning Cloth(1x), AC Adapter (1x), USB Cable(1x), Video-Out Cable(1x), Lithium Batteries(1x), Carrying Bag(1x). Manufacturer's Warranty: 1 Year.
feature_bullets: 4.3" LCD display. Four adjustable magnification levels from 6x-14x.
Sharp full color mode and two other modes for reading: black on white, and white on black.
Rechargeable Lithium battery providing 2.5 hours working period.
Screen Lock: freeze a text image on screen for easier reading.​
Video-out: to any monitor with video-in. Simple to use with single clicks for all features and function.
